translation.Name: Rio Note - BHDG Report #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: What a victory, we defeated the Retakers before they could even dream about getting to the island! The supply manager said that it wasted too many turret ammunition boxes, but I don't care, they were traitors from the very moment they declared war on what remains of our great group, and that is all.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_1: We might as well keep the turrets on the dock just in case of another nautical raid, or until we know for sure that the Retakers won't be a problem anymore. Our guards say that one turret being used at the entrance of the camp is enough to protect against any land raid.
